DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate safety and efficacy in terms of spillage risk and fertility-sparing of mesial incision for laparoscopic dermoid cystectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Ovarian Mesial Incision: a New Safe and Fertility-sparing Technique
DOC.criteria: reproductive age preoperative findings suggestive for benign tumor regular menstrual cycles at least six months before surgery previous pelvic surgery known endocrine disease estrogenprogestin use before surgery
